snippet: The dire numbers of the city’s finances have been accompanied by an unusual and very welcome amount of plain talk and realism.
abstract: Editorial observes that dire budget news from Yonkers, NY, has been accompanied by an unusual and very welcome amount of plain talk; suggests that the four-year financial plan proposed by Mayor Michael Spano to close shortfalls may serve as a reminder to struggling municipal governments everywhere that painful but realistic solutions are needed.
lead_paragraph: The dire numbers of the city’s finances have been accompanied by an unusual and very welcome amount of plain talk and realism.
